title: Count to ten
brief_description: A public relations film designed to teach people in public service who deal with the general public that they can maintain the goodwill of a customer even when they must stick to “company policy”.
description: A public relations film designed to teach people in public service who deal with the general public that they can maintain the goodwill of a customer even when they must stick to “company policy”.
